articles.title: Cabinet minister claimed he won £2,000 on election bets - BBC.com
articles.description: Scottish Secretary Alister Jack says he has never broken any Gambling Commission rules.
articles.content:
A Conservative cabinet minister claimed that he won more than £2,000 betting on a July general election.
Shortly after Prime Minister Rishi Sunak announced the election date, Scottish Secretary Alis… [+1594 chars]

articles.title: World's first epilepsy device fitted in boy's skull | BBC News - BBC News
articles.description: A boy with severe epilepsy has become the first patient in the world to trial a new device fitted in their skull to control seizures. The neurostimulator, wh...
